prompt: Transparent PNG of pastel Minecraft-like voxel clouds for a website hero background. Clouds only; everything else fully transparent (alpha).
subject: pastel voxel clouds
style: Minecraft-like voxel/pixel illustration (original, not using any official assets), soft dithering, clean edges, premium UI background
composition: wide hero background; cloud clusters framing the corners and edges; big clean empty center for logo/header; avoid placing clouds over the center
lighting: diffuse daylight, no harsh shadows, no sun disk
palette: warm cream/off-white clouds with pale sky-blue and faint warm-gold shadow tones
constraints: transparent background/alpha; ONLY clouds and a tiny amount of soft cloud haze; no text; no watermark; no logos; no characters; no terrain; no buildings; keep center mostly empty
negative: photorealistic; realistic sky; high contrast; neon; heavy grain; lens flare; clutter; copyrighted assets; text
